code: export var formatUrlWithRedirect=function formatUrlWithRedirect(url,redirectUrl){if(!redirectUrl){return url;}var base=window.location.origin;var uri=new URL(url,base);var redirectUri=new URL(redirectUrl);var redirectParam=redirectUri.searchParams.get('redirect');if(redirectParam){uri.searchParams.append('redirect',redirectParam);}else{uri.searchParams.append('redirect',redirectUri.toString());}return uri.toString();};
